concept.title: Orchestrate : .Activating the Conga Composer Remote Site to Generate Document Steps vOctober-23

conbody.p: Created by William Abernathy on Sep 20, 2023
This task is only required for orgs that upgraded to a new version of the Conga Orchestrate. It is not required for orgs with new installations of Conga Orchestrate.
To activate the Conga_Composer remote site to use Conga Composer to Generate a document step:

ol.li: Enter Remote Sites in the Quick Find search box.
Find the Conga_Composer Remote Site and click Edit.
Check the Active checkbox field to activate the remote site.
